appDesc.message: [ES] Quickly convert formatted content into AI friendly markdown

popupSubtitle.message: [ES] Converts rich text in your clipboard to AI prompt friendly format.

openEditorAria.description: Aria label for opening the editor

clearAria.description: Aria label for the clear button

notifyMarkdownDetected.message: [ES] Markdown detected in clipboard. Click button in upper right to edit.

notifyNoRichText.message: [ES] No rich text found in clipboard.
notifyNoRichText.description: Notification when no rich text is found

notifyNoRichTextDetails.message: [ES] Only plain text found in clipboard. Copy rich text from a web page or document first.
notifyNoRichTextDetails.description: Detailed error message when only plain text is found

notifyAlreadyConverted.message: [ES] No rich text found in clipboard. Already converted?
notifyAlreadyConverted.description: Notification when text might already be markdown

notifyNoTextDetails.message: [ES] No text found in clipboard. Copy rich text from a web page or document first.
notifyNoTextDetails.description: Detailed error message when clipboard is empty

notifySuccess.message: [ES] Clipboard updated successfully and added to clipboard.

notifyErrorPrefix.message: [ES] Was not able to process clipboard.
